meanings.sent1: The thesps rehearsed their lines diligently for the play.
meanings.sent2: The thesps received a standing ovation for their performance.
meanings.sent3: The thesps decided to play a prank on the director during rehearsals.
meanings.sent4: The thesps painted a vivid picture of the characters they portrayed.
meanings.sent5: The thesps brought the characters to life on stage with their acting skills.

meanings.definition: belonging to or characteristic of actors
meanings.sent1: The theater was filled with thesp audience members.
meanings.sent2: Her thesp attire caught the attention of the casting director.
meanings.sent3: The thesp group organized a fun costume party for the cast.
meanings.sent4: The thesp atmosphere backstage was filled with excitement and nerves.
meanings.sent5: The thesp props added authenticity to the stage setting.

meanings.definition: pertaining to the profession of acting
meanings.sent1: She pursued a thesp career after studying drama in college.
meanings.sent2: The thesp community supported each other during auditions.
meanings.sent3: The thesp workshop offered valuable insights into the industry.
meanings.sent4: His thesp skills shone brightly in the leading role.
meanings.sent5: The thesp training program focused on honing acting techniques.
